title: emanija
author: emanija
content: Hello, I want to ask, I have a similar question, maybe you know if you have a similar script or name, I'm looking everywhere, I can't find it anywhere, I need a similar mobile program. like: Vorsi, satoshi, hexa network or similar crypto miner programs, thanks in advance.

comments.author: EmpoEX
comments.body: Why are you looking for a cloud mining script?I believe most cloud mining websites are scams.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Almost all crypto cloud mining programs are scams. Not sure why you are looking for similar scripts. Are you planning to set up your own cloud mining platform so that you can lie to and scam users of their money with an empty promise of growth in yearly returns or passive income?If you are, then I discourage you from doing so, as it's unethical and not accepted in the community.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on June 27, 2023, 10:51:05 PMAlmost all crypto cloud mining programs are scams. Not sure why you are looking for similar scripts. Are you planning to set up your own cloud mining platform so that you can lie to and scam users of their money with an empty promise of growth in yearly returns or passive income?If you are, then I discourage you from doing so, as it's unethical and not accepted in the community.The scripts he is talking about are almost similar to HYIP Templates with just a fake cloud mining touch added to deceive new users and investors into investing their money. I can’t undersstand how these websites and scam projects continue to operate while people still also invest in something so unreal. How can these mining websites promise more profit than any powerful mining device can deliver? I will simply explain how it’s not possible:It is easy to see that it’s fake when you calculate the profits you would receive from the most powerful device available in the market, which may give you $100 for example per day after paying electricity fees. These websites claim to offer even higher returns without requiring any effort from you apart from giving them with your money.Anyways if that's what this member is seeking for, he should be aware that this is not the right place to post this request. If he is genuinely looking for similar websites to invest in and doesn’t understand the risks I have clarified things for him to avoid such scam.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on June 27, 2023, 10:51:05 PMAlmost all crypto cloud mining programs are scams. Not sure why you are looking for similar scripts. Are you planning to set up your own cloud mining platform so that you can lie to and scam users of their money with an empty promise of growth in yearly returns or passive income?If you are, then I discourage you from doing so, as it's unethical and not accepted in the community.We cannot admit that this is categorically unacceptable in the group, especially when we see that the most popular trading platform in the market, Binance, is leading a cloud mining program, according to what one of the users explained here. Also, the well-known mining pool Viabtc had launched its cloud mining program since 2020.I am convinced that they are all spam programs in one form or another, regardless of who runs them. But what I meant is that these programs are still popular and their promoters are still succeeding in causing victims. I'm not encouraging OP to go ahead with the scam project but I'm just explaining his position that he might be following programs run by major platforms like Binance.

comments.author: milewilda
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on June 27, 2023, 10:51:05 PMAlmost all crypto cloud mining programs are scams. Not sure why you are looking for similar scripts. Are you planning to set up your own cloud mining platform so that you can lie to and scam users of their money with an empty promise of growth in yearly returns or passive income?If you are, then I discourage you from doing so, as it's unethical and not accepted in the community.This!You should really be taking this advise because we do know that there are lots of scams now and there's no way about being legit with those mining apps that could be done through phone because it cant really be just that possible.Ive seen some mining based kind like OmegaNetwork, Avive, or ICE which they are really that having that kind of mining thing but those token value are zero.  For those coins who do have actual value but claiming out that could be able to mine through mobile then its just scam. Whenever you do able to encounter some good returns or offer then always be skeptical on this one and be that always make your own research .Cloudmining would really be that legit on the time that we do talk about Hashflare or Genesis which do offer those contracts but if you do have plans on being a miner then you would really be needing tobuy your own asics or GPU or basing up on the coin that you are mining into.
